faq.description: The EHU IT Hub is a cutting-edge technological nexus committed to fostering innovation, collaboration, and excellence in the realm of information technology. Serving as a melting pot for technophiles, developers, and industry professionals, it paves the way for groundbreaking advancements and solutions.

openJobs.title: QA Engenier
openJobs.subtitle: QA Methodologies, Test Case Execution, Bug Reporting
openJobs.description: Join our team as a Junior QA Engineer! Engage in test plan development, execute test cases, report bugs, and collaborate with cross-functional teams. Ideal for detail-oriented problem solvers.

openJobs.title: Java Developer
openJobs.subtitle: Java, Spring Framework, REST, Postgres, Maven/Gradle
openJobs.description: Seeking a Java Developer to build and maintain robust applications. Involves working with Spring, RESTful services, and database management.

caseStudies.title: TimeCat EHU
caseStudies.description: TimeCat EHU - a telegram bot for convenient academic schedule tracking with a high degree of personalisation, alerts and a built-in assistant. Helps to solve the problem of inconvenient schedule output at the university.

caseStudies.title: ChatGuard EHU
caseStudies.description: ChatGuard EHU - a bot moderator of student chats at the university, ensuring the safety of student communication and protection of confidential information. Ensures that chats remain exclusive to EHU students.

caseStudies.title: EHU Support
caseStudies.description: EHU Support - a complex solution for the communication department, including a Telegram bot with registration information and the ability to contact managers. Managers can track the activity of applicants through the website with detailed statistics, communicate with applicants and edit the content of the bot. Currently, the project is being redesigned so that the EHU administration can provide advice not only to applicants, but to all students.

technologies.title: Frontend Technologies
technologies.description:
In the Advanced Frontend Development section at EHU IT Hub, students gain more than just knowledge - they experience hands-on learning through engaging projects. Our focus includes:
- JS/TS, Web-components
- React, Angular, Vue,
- Vite, Webpack
- Storybook

technologies.title: Backend Technologies
technologies.description:
In the Backend Technologies section at EHU IT Hub, we introduce students to a wide range of backend technologies in a hands-on way. Here are some key areas we cover:
- Java (Spring Framework), 
- Python (Django)
- API Development (REST and other)
- ORM, Postgres
- SSR
- Cloud services (AWS, Minio)

technologies.title: DevOps Practices
technologies.description:
In our DevOps Practices section, we utilize a robust DevOps tech stack to empower our students with industry-relevant skills. Our stack includes:
- Gitlab Ci/CD 
- Prometheus and Grafana for monitoring
- Docker
- Kubernetes

hero.title: EHU IT Hub: The Student Forge of IT Innovation and Expertise
hero.subtitle: Discover EHU IT Hub at the European Humanities University: a unique blend of academic and industry-relevant skills. Here, students gain experience close to real production, turning innovative ideas into market-ready solutions. Join our community where technology meets real-world application.

aboutUs.title:
Meet the Minds Behind EHU IT Hub: 
Where Technology and Talent Thrive
aboutUs.heading: about us
aboutUs.description: EHU IT Hub, an independent unit of the European Humanities University, is made up of experienced students who are the driving force behind our endeavors. At the core of our mission is our commitment to provide the university with top-notch digital support, focusing on the development and implementation of innovative IT solutions uniquely tailored to EHU's needs. At the same time, we actively engage our students in university projects that directly contribute to the development and optimization of EHU's digital ecosystem. Our approach is based on being consistent with industry best practices to ensure smooth project delivery, efficiency and high quality.

contactUs.heading: Connect with EHU IT Hub
contactUs.description: Join us: become a valued member of the ehu it hub team!
